mapper.sql: id, version_num, process_name, creat_user, creat_time, update_user, update_time, remark, prosess_description, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into process (id, version_num, process_name, creat_user, creat_time, update_user, update_time, remark, prosess_description, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prosessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
version_num,

mapper.update:
update process
version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_user = #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prosess_description = #{prosessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update process set version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_user = #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prosess_description = #{prosessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select p.* from process p inner join report_data rd on p.`id` = rd.`process_id` where rd.`id` = #{reportId};
